org.orgName: Third Judicial District of Washington Territory, holding Terms at Seattle

body.p: Territory of Washington County of Spokane
To any Constable and keeper of the jail of said County

Whereas David E. Kimble and A.B. Coriell has been brought this day before the undersigned one of the Justices of the Peace in and for said County. Charged on the oath of William W. Tinkham with hearing on the 25th day of August 1887 in said County "did then and there, and in an angry and threatening manner and being armed with a double barreled shot gun carried in the hands of David E. Kimble, did threaten to do great bodily injury to the said William W. Tinkham, and Annie L. Tinkham. To wit: to beat strike and kill said Wiliam W. Tinkham and Annie L. Tinkham, and in the progress of the trial the said justice finds upon examination of the complaint made by the said William W. Tinkham against the said David E. Kimble and A.B. Corriell is unfounded and frisolous, and whereas at said trial it was ordered that the defendants be discharged
and it was further ordered and adjudged by the court that the said complainant William W. Tinkham pay the costs of the prosecution on said Complaint taxed at the sum of forty and 25/100 $40.25 dollars, and that he stand commited until said costs are paid or he is otherwise legally discharged.

Therefore in the name of the United States, you are commanded to take the body of said William W. Tinkham and him convey and deliver to the Keeper of the jail of said County who is hereby commanded to recieve and keep the said William W. Tinkham in safe custody in prison until the aforesaid sum of $40.25 and all legal expenses be paid and satisfied, or until he be discharged therefrom by due course of law, and of this writ make due return according to law.
Given under my hand this 2nd day of September 1887
John T. Mason Justice of the Peace
Territory of Wash vs. W.W. Tinkham

Constable $11.70 Witnesses A. Hartson $2.00 L.A. Ford 2.00 Mr. Blogitt 2.20 E.G. English 2.00 Mr. O Cleary 2.00 Mrs. O Cleary 2.00 William Gage 2.00 Mrs M Kimble 2.00 Ida Kimble 2.00 Mrs. Morrison 2.00 Mr. Barrington 2.00 Mrs. Barrington 2.00
